languages.text: Странным образом члены семьи Версериан регулярно оказывались в сердце дворцовых интриг, становились жертвами убийств и страдали в ходе случайных бунтов. Череда загадочных событий, преследовавших их дом, прервалась внезапно, когда испустила дух Регина Зауэрбэк.

For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.
languages.original_text: Странным образом члены семьи Версериан регулярно оказывались в сердце дворцовых интриг, становились жертвами убийств и страдали в ходе случайных бунтов. Череда загадочных событий, преследовавших их дом, прервалась внезапно, когда испустила дух Регина Зауэрбэк.

traits.locale_text: The members of the Werserian family time and time again for some strange reason found themselves in the heart of palace intrigues, were becoming the victims of assassinations, and suffered in unpredictable riots. A string of strange events that haunted their House, suddenly stopped, when Macharius Sauerback met his end.

The members of the Werserian family time and time again for some strange reason found themselves in the heart of palace intrigues, were becoming the victims of assassinations, and suffered in unpredictable riots. A string of strange events that haunted their House, suddenly stopped, when Macharius Sauerback met his end.

For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their House suddenly stopped when Macharius Sauerback met his end.

For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their House suddenly stopped when Macharius Sauerback met his end.

For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Macharius Sauerback met his end.

For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

languages.text: 出于某种未知原因，韦尔森家族的成员总是频繁成为暗杀的目标，或沦为突发暴乱的受害者，或身处宫廷阴谋的漩涡中心。然而，当蕾吉娜·苏尔贝克死后，一直纠缠韦尔森家族的不幸事故便戛然而止。
languages.original_text: For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

traits.locale_text: 出于某种未知原因，韦尔森家族的成员总是频繁成为暗杀的目标，或沦为突发暴乱的受害者，或身处宫廷阴谋的漩涡中心。然而，当马卡里乌斯·苏尔贝克死后，一直纠缠韦尔森家族的不幸事故便戛然而止。

languages.text: Aus unbekannten Gründen wurden Mitglieder der Familie Werserian immer wieder zum Ziel von Attentaten, zum Opfer von unerwarteten Aufständen und zum Spielball von Palastintrigen. Das Elend, welches das Haus plagte, endete urplötzlich, als Regina Sauerback starb.
languages.original_text: For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

traits.locale_text: Aus unbekannten Gründen wurden Mitglieder der Familie Werserian immer wieder zum Ziel von Attentaten, zum Opfer von unerwarteten Aufständen und zum Spielball von Palastintrigen. Das Elend, welches das Haus plagte, endet urplötzlich, als Macharius Sauerback starb.

languages.text: Pour une raison inconnue, les membres de la dynastie Werserian furent les cibles de nombreux assassinats, révoltes et intrigues au sein du palais. Ces malheurs prirent fin soudainement, peu de temps après la mort de Regina Sauerback.
languages.original_text: For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

traits.locale_text: Pour une raison inconnue, les membres de la dynastie Werserian furent les cibles de nombreux assassinats, révoltes et intrigues au sein du palais. Ces malheurs prirent fin soudainement, peu de temps après la mort de Macharius Sauerback.

languages.text: Por motivos desconocidos, los miembros de la familia Werserian se convirtieron repetidas veces en objetivo de asesinatos, en víctimas de revueltas inesperadas y en el centro de las intrigas de palacio. La mala fortuna de la casa llegó a un fin abrupto con la muerte de Regina Sauerback.
languages.original_text: For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

traits.locale_text: Por motivos desconocidos, los miembros de la familia Werserian se convirtieron repetidas veces en objetivo de asesinatos, en víctimas de revueltas inesperadas y en el centro de las intrigas de palacio. La mala fortuna de la casa llegó a un fin abrupto con la muerte de Macharius Sauerback.

languages.text: 理由も分からぬまま、ウェルザリアン家の人々は暗殺の標的や、予期せぬ暴動の犠牲、そして王室の計略の中心となってしまうことが幾度もあった。一族を蝕んでいた悲運は、レジーナ・ザウアーバックが最期を遂げるとぱたりと止んだ。
languages.original_text: For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

traits.locale_text: 理由も分からぬまま、ウェルザリアン家の人々は暗殺の標的や、予期せぬ暴動の犠牲、そして王室の計略の中心となってしまうことが幾度もあった。一族を蝕んでいた悲運は、レジーナ・ザウアーバックが最期を遂げるとぱたりと止んだ。

languages.text: Werserian ailesi üyeleri, bilinmeyen sebeplerle kendilerini sürekli olarak suikast girişimlerinin hedefi, ön görülemeyen isyanların kurbanı ve saray entrikalarının odağı olarak buldu. Hanenin başına musallat olan talihsizlikler, Regina Sauerback hayatını kaybettiğinde kesildi.
languages.original_text: For reasons unknown, members of the Werserian family found themselves time and time again as targets of assassinations, victims of unpredictable riots, and the focus of palace intrigue. The misfortune that plagued their house suddenly stopped when Regina Sauerback met her end.

traits.locale_text: Werserian ailesi üyeleri, bilinmeyen sebeplerle kendilerini sürekli olarak suikast girişimlerinin hedefi, ön görülemeyen isyanların kurbanı ve saray entrikalarının odağı olarak buldular. Hanenin başına musallat olmuş talihsizlik, Regina Sauerback hayatını kaybettiğinde aniden son buldu.
